name: translatory
content:
translatory adjective
(MOVING OBJECT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
mathematics, physics
  specialized relating to or involving movement from one place to another without any other change of direction or movement such as rotation: The two systems are in uniform translatory motion relative to each other. The Earth's rotation carries the object alternately in and against the direction of translatory movement.
More examplesFewer examplesThe sudden change in flow created a translatory wave.In Newtonian mechanics, coordinates remain invariable during a translatory motion.
